description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hot Potato HD a high tech take on the popular childrens game Hot Potato! Pass the potato (in the form of the Xbox Controller) back and forth while the music plays. But be careful! If you're holding it when the music stops, Hot Potato! It's fun for the whole family.
description.short: Hot Potato HD a high tech take on the popular childrens game Hot Potato! Pass the potato (in the form of the Xbox Controller) back and forth while the music plays. But be careful! If you're holding it when the music stops, Hot Potato! It's fun for the whole family.
